dmca.title: UK Company Claims Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Google, inc

Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
[Private] 
Mountain View, CA 94043

1. We would like you to remove from your indexes and cache, website pages which have been copied from our own site and are an infringement on our copyright as author of those pages.

Specifically, we are referring to the text found on the following pages: http://www.ukadultchat.co.uk

For which to copyright belongs to Into It Ltd, a UK registered company, which owns the domain.

2. Our copyrighted text is appearing on the following pages, indexed by your search engine. I have provided for each page a google search url where the page can be found on google.

The searches were taken at 08:22 GMT on 22nd February 2005. http://www.60pwank.co.uk
Search1: "If your looking for cheaper phone sex you've come to the right place!"
Search1 Url:http://www.google.co.uk/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&rls=GGLD,GGLD:2004-24,GGLD:en&q=%22If+your+looking+for+cheaper+phone+sex+you%27ve+come+to+the+right+place%21%22

Search2: "60p uk phone sex and phone sex uk numbers" Search2Url:http://www.google.co.uk/search?hl=en&safe=off&rls=GG LD%2CGG LD%3A2004-24%2CGGLD%3Aen&q=%2260p+uk+phone+sex+and+phone+sex+uk+numbers%22&meta=

Search 3: "60p uk phone sex"
Search3Url:http://www.google.co.uk/search?hl=en&safe=off&rls=GGLD%2CGG LD%3A2004-24%2CGGLD%3Aen&q=%2260p+uk+phone+sex%22&meta=

Please also note that as proof that the content is authored by us, the telephone numbers advertised on the site are contracted to us via:

[Private]
[Private] 
[Private] 
United Kingdom

You may contact [Private] at [Private] if required.

3. I can be contacted via email at [Private] 

4. Unfortunately no contact details are provided on the infringing site and according to the WHOIS, the domain is privately held.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Signed
[Private] 
Director 
[Private]
[Private] 
[Private]: [Private], [Private] 
Registered in England & Wales, [Private]
